department.ch: 環境工程研究所碩士班

goal.en: 1. To understand the regulatory requirements and legislative trend of environmental impact assessment (EIA). 2. To describe the system and procedures of environmental impact assessment. 3. To introduce the key environmental factors for assessment. 4. Case study: Introduce the Taiwan’s important EIA reviewing projects."
goal.ch: 1. 瞭解環境影響評估作業之法規依據。 2. 說明環境影響評估之制度與作業流程。 3. 介紹各項重要環境因子之評估方式與技術依據。 4. 介紹國內重大環評審查之案例探討。"

content.en: "The major objective of this course is focused on the administrative regulations and reviewing procedures of environmental impact assessment (EIA). To provide students a basic knowledge of the requirements and framework of the EIA process and understand how to implement the relevant EIA process. To discuss the current Taiwan’s EIA issues, it also could provide students to further understand the knowledge of balances between economic development and environmental protection."
content.ch: 本課程以環境影響評估法及其相關法令規定為課程主軸，期使同學能認識環境影響評估之意義，及如何執行相關之環評作業。同時藉由國內重大環評審查案件之討論，使修課同學進一步瞭解經濟發展與環境保護間之平衡點。

textbook.en: "Haung, Kuang-Haui, Environmental Impact Assessment, Tasi-Hai Book Co."
textbook.ch: 黃光輝編著，環境影響評估，滄海書局。
